title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 1363 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
April 09, 2011

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 1363





On April 9, 2011, the President signed the following bill into law:

	H.R. 1363, “Further Additional Continuing Appropriations Amendments, 2011,” providing appropriations through April 15, 2011.
